thread:
Researchers uncover hidden biases in LLMs' assumptions about human rationality 🧠🔍 #AIResearch #BiasInAI
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2406.17055
The study reveals LLMs predict human choices rationally, outperforming humans in alignment with models but falling short in real-world behavior. 🧠🤖 #AIResearch #LLMBehavior
The study shows LLMs align with human inferences. 🤖🧠 #LLMResearch #HumanBehavior
"New research reveals LLMs misalign with human behavior. 🧠🤖 #AIAlignment #LLMChallenges"
